name: Connect them all!
description:
Connect all the shapes together in this minimalist puzzle game! Shapes can only be joined with shapes of the same color and/or polygon. Make sure that each shape can reach every other shape to beat the level and lines can't cross!

Also, if a shape has a number in it, it must have that many direct connections!

Connect them all! is a game made in under 48 hours for GMTKJam2021 (theme: Joined Together). I had a great time honing in on a design given the theme and time constraints, as well as racking my brain over puzzle design. It's definitely tough in such a small time frame!

Hope you enjoy!

---

Controls:

Left Click Drag from one shape to another to connect

Right Click on a connection to remove it

(Esc to exit the application. Beware! Progress doesn't save)
